Welcome to pyqode.python documentation!¶

pyqode.python is an official extension to pyqode that adds a set of additional modes and panels dedicated to python source code editing.

This documentation is a simple API reference for the new modes and panels. You should have read the pyqode.core documentation that covers the core concepts of pyQode.

Parts of the documentation:¶

  • What’s New?

    What’s new since the last release, and what is planned for the next one.

  • Download & Install

    Instructions on where and how to install pyQode.

  • API Reference

    The api reference documentation
